guardrails.name: no-hardcoded-credentials
guardrails.description: No API keys, passwords, tokens, or certificates in source code
guardrails.pattern: Detects strings matching credential patterns in code files

guardrails.name: no-sensitive-data-exposure
guardrails.description: No PII, SSN, or sensitive data in code or comments

guardrails.name: tls-minimum-version
guardrails.description: All network connections must use TLS 1.2 or higher

guardrails.name: industry-approved-crypto
guardrails.description: Only industry encryption standards approved cryptographic algorithms

guardrails.name: spec-required
guardrails.description: SDD specification document must exist before implementation

guardrails.name: tests-required
guardrails.description: TDD test plan and tests must exist before code merges

guardrails.name: review-required
guardrails.description: Devin Review must complete on every PR before merge

guardrails.name: coverage-minimum
guardrails.description: Branch coverage must meet category thresholds

guardrails.name: pr-description-required
guardrails.description: PR must include description with migration summary and test results

guardrails.name: no-production-access
guardrails.description: Devin sessions must not access production systems directly

guardrails.name: approved-repos-only
guardrails.description: Sessions can only access pre-approved repositories
